objects.text:
Classic Mario Characters
Official Nintendo Merchandise
100% Premium Cotton
Durable Screen Print Design

product_details.name: Nintendo Men's T-Shirt
product_details.description: Package Dimensions: 7.36 x 6.5 x 2.01 inches; 3.81 ounces. Department: mens. Customer Reviews: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 1,615 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a retro gaming-inspired design centered around a t-shirt product. The background consists of a dark gradient with layered bordered frames in green and yellow dashed lines, giving a framed digital arcade appearance. Decorative checker patterns using red, green, and yellow accent blocks appear in the corners and near the top-left, enhancing a pixelated theme. The main header (ID: heading) uses a pixel-style white font, accompanied by a bold red subheading (ID: subheading) below it. A list of product features (ID: description) is aligned left in yellow, easy-to-read text. The price (ID: price) is prominently displayed in large white type. Below that, a red button-shaped rectangle (ID: cta_background) contains a white label (ID: cta) encouraging purchase. A scaled t-shirt image (ID: product_image) showcasing pixel characters balances the layout visually.

**Color Palette:**
- Black: #121212 to #232323 (background gradient)
- White: #FFFFFF (text)
- Red: #E63946 (accents, subheading, CTA background)
- Yellow: #FFD166 (feature text, pixel blocks)
- Green: #57CC99 (decorative pixel blocks)
product_color: The product image showcases a black t-shirt with colorful pixel art characters from the Mario franchise. The primary background color is jet black (#000000), which creates a perfect high-contrast canvas allowing the pixelated characters to pop vividly. Key colors include fire red (#FF3C1F), leaf green (#4CAF50), golden yellow (#FFC300), peach-skin (#F4A460), cloud white (#FFFFFF), and earthy brown (#8B4513). These colors are used to define each character distinctly and are blended using sharp contrasts and outlines. The overall color usage is playful and retro, evoking nostalgia. A fitting banner can use a dark background with sprinkles of these vibrant colors to highlight featured characters.
